Text: RE Subject Your USAA OrderDECEMBER Dear Paul Lucci Thank you for shopping with USAA Merchandise Services Company The following item from order was shipped on DECEMBER via RPSGR ITEM QTY Your Order Tracking Number is Please visit the carriers web site for tracking information If you have any questions about your order simply reply to this email message Or you can always reach our member service at hours a day days a week Please refer to the order number above Thank you for shopping with us We hope you will return soon to our site at wwwusaacom We are constantly changing our features and promotion specials so visit often Member Service USAA Merchandise Services Company We make every effort to deliver your order promptly and safely Occasionally merchandise may receive damage during shipment Please check your shipment carefully On FedEx UPS and Parcel Post shipments if there is apparent damage contact the local service office in your area to advise them of the damage and ask for a control number from them Immediately call Member Service at with the control number so we can arrange for a replacement to be sent On freight deliveries check the carton for signs of damage If damage is seen have the driver note any visible damage on the drivers and your copy of the freight bill along with the drivers signature Sign WITH EXCEPTION if damage is found to the carton only If damage is excessive refuse delivery Again immediately contact Member Service to report the damage We will arrange to replace the item This email is not encrypted and could be intercepted read copied altered CAUTION Do not send anything via unencrypted email that you consider confidential
